column2: This data set is composed of hotel records for 5 different cities in Southeast Florida. The data includes identifiers for each hotel, records of hotel amenities, locational data and the amount of coral cover within a 10 km buffer of the hotel. This data was compiled for statistical analysis to determine how each of the variables contributes to the hotel price.
Coral and Hardbottom Habitats in Florida. Florida Fish and Wildlife Conservation Commission. http://geodata.myfwc.com/datasets/coral-and-hard-bottom-habitats-in-florida
Tripadvisor.com
Florida Geoplan Center. Lodging Facilities in Florida - 2016 (FGDC)
FIND SOURCE
Unique identifier for each hotel
Name of the hotel gathered from tripadvisor or the Florida geoplan center
Street address of the hotel
City and state the hotel is located in
The full address of the hotel
Hotel guest rating on a scale of 1-5
Number of reviews of the hotel
Binary variable of whether the hotel has a pool, 1 = Yes, 0 = No
Binary variable of whether hotel has a bar, 1 = Yes, 0 = No
Binary variable of whether the hotel has a business center, 1 = Yes, 0 = No
Binary variable for whether hotel has a conference center, 1 = Yes, 0 = No
Binary variable for whether hotel offers meeting rooms, 1 = Yes, 0 = No
Binary variable for whether hotel has wheelchair access, 1 = Yes, 0 = No
Binary variable for whether the hotel has a concierge, 1 = Yes, 0 = No
Binary variable for whether the hotel offers laundry service, 1 = Yes, 0 = No
Binary variable for whether the hotel has a gym, 1 = Yes, 0 = No
Binary variable for whether the hotel has free wifi, 1 = Yes, 0 = No
Binary variable for whether the hotel has multilingual staff, 1 = Yes, 0 = No
Binary variable for whether the hotel is non-smoking, 1 = Yes, 0 = No
Binary variable for whether the hotel offers free breakfast, 1 = Yes, 0 = No
Binary variable for whether the hotel offers transport to the airport, 1 = Yes, 0 = No
Binary variable for whether the hotel has free parking, 1 = Yes, 0 = No
Binary variable for whether the hotel is on the beachfront, 1 = Yes, 0 = No
Low price for a standard 2-person room per night for the year
High price for a standard 2-person room per night for the year
Latitude of the hotel
Longitude of the hotel
Distance from the hotel to the nearest beach
Distance from the hotel to the waterline of the nearest beach
Width of beach in front of the hotel. Calculated by subtracting NEAR_DIST_BEACH from NEAR_DIST_SHORE
Distance to the nearest beach access point, as some hotels do not have direct beach access
Distance to the nearest airport
Distance to the nearest dive site
Distance to the nearest coral reef
The total number of dive sites within the 10km buffer
Area of coral cover within the 10km buffer of the hotel
City the hotel is in out of the following list: Boca Raton, Fort Lauderdale, Delray Beach, Miami Beach, Key West
Neighborhood of the city the hotel is in out of the following list: Boca Raton, Fort Lauderdale, Delray Beach, Miami Beach, South Beach, Key West
Binary variable for whether there is a dive site within the 10km buffer of the hotel, 1 = Yes, 0 = No
Hotel class on a 1-5 star scale
The number of rooms in the hotel
Binary variable for whether the hotel has a 3-star hotel class, 1 = Yes, 0 = No
Binary variable for whether the hotel has a 4-star hotel class, 1 = Yes, 0 = No
Binary variable for whether the hotel has a 5-star hotel class, 1 = Yes, 0 = No
